title: Delete the verified ownership of a URL property

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: url_property_meta
parameters.description: Information about the URL property that you want to delete the verified ownership of.

parameters.name: property_type
parameters.description: Type of the URL property. Enum valuesï¼š 1: Domain. 2: URL prefix.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: An owned URL that you want to delete the verified ownership of. Pass in the URL according to the property_type that you specify.
